Welcome

Here at Farley & Associates, Inc. we push our vendor partnerships to create a customized, yet scalable program for each and every customer.  We strive to optimize not only the product, but the path to get there. Scroll to learn more.

About

We are a family business that started 3 generations ago. Over the span of 3 decades, we have developed methodologies for following a product from concept to consumer. The journey can be long, but very rewarding. We love working with passionate, enthusiastic people that love what they do – because we love what we do.

Farley & Associates, Inc. has been working with most of the same customers and vendor partnerships since our establishment 30+ years ago. Disrupting the market is exciting, but we never forget about the people who got us to this point. Therefore, our success is not dictated by the control and distribution of the next widget, but by the longevity of our relationships

Services

We are passionate about creating products that we, and our clients, are very proud of. Our services include:

Sales & Marketing – Our office has dedicated a combined 100 years of service to our top 5 manufacturers. Each member of our team brings a diverse perspective to Farley that allows us to cover more ground in the process.

Product Photography & Design – We have a professional Product Photographer and Graphic Designer on staff that can assist in reaching urgent deadlines for our customers.

Licensing & Branding – Part of our companies differentiating nature is our passion and drive for the perfect ‘first impression’. The perfect first impression is between the consumers we serve and the product we create. Our focus is in the message that makes each product sustainable in a competitive marketplace.  Either we create the ecosystem and brand experience, or we find the right brand partner for the job.

Sourcing & QC – Our office in Hong Kong evaluates all new factories and potential opportunities. With over 30 years in manufacturing experience, we can meet your needs.

Investments – We have a structure in place to help existing manufactures to startups obtain financing they need to launch a proper product campaign.

The Team

Let us know how we can help! We are regarded as industry leaders in manufacture consulting, focused on delivering a product from concept to consumers. Reach out below.
